thread.title: James

author: James
title: James
text: This was the first time I ordered from this company, When I received my order I was very surprised by the quality of the tree, that I purchased, it was even flowering, But due to the snow we just had it killed off the flowers. I have placed another order for a different tree, and will continue to order from this company again and also have referred friends to this company as well.... Very Happy
